summary: When a brother accompanies his estranged sister on a road trip, they rediscover how obnoxious they are together - and how much they might need each other.

Smith|Roy Thomas|Sarah Virden|C. Mason Wells
keywords: brother sister incest|sex with brother|sex with sister|dialogue driven
title: The Color Wheel
